entry.title: Maltesers Buttons Treat - 68g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.69

The Lighter Way to Enjoy Chocolate 

   These crunchy, chocolatey snacks are a fun way to get all that Maltesers goodness in a smaller bite! Delectable chocolate buttons filled with crispy Maltesers bits, chomp down for a satisfying crunch, or let them melt on your tongue to enjoy that blissful warm chocolate taste. No matter how you enjoy these delicious treats, make sure you take advantage of this treat-sized bag and share the joy with all your friends!

68 g

entry.title: Kit Kat White Chocolate UK - 45g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

Kit Kat is Now a Little Creamier!

  A different way to enjoy Kit Kat, for those of us with a sweeter than average tooth! Each bar contains 4 crispy wafer sticks dipped in a smooth, creamy batch of rich white chocolate. This great treat will have you up on cloud nine!

(1 bar) 45g

entry.title: Galaxy Counters Peg Bag - 122g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 7.49

Pieces of Pure Chocolate Pleasure 

  Galaxy Counters are a perfect snack for any milk chocolate fan. These bite-sized morsels of rich Galaxy Milk Chocolate will slowly melt in your mouth, allowing you to indulge in the silky smooth texture of this luxurious chocolate treat. 

  The resealable* bag is the perfect size to share with friends and family, but if you can't bring yourself to give them away, it's okay, we've been there too. Get lost in the amazing flavour, sure to transport you out of this world!

Why have cotton when you can have silk?

 

(1 pouch) 122g

*resealable when using the provided fresh seal sticker located on the back of the bag

entry.title: Nestle Munchies Milk Chocolate Roll - 51.9g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

A Delicious UK Treat To Take On The Go

   A sweet, crunchy cookie center enrobed in smooth, creamy caramel and all wrapped up in a rich milk chocolate coating, this British favourite will become one of yours too! This roll is perfect for snacking when out and about, or the right portion to down all in one go. You might want to order our share size bag too, as these might disappear quicker than you thought!

 

(1 roll) 51.9g

entry.title: Kinder Chocolate with Cereal Bar UK - 24g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrero
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.29

A Different Way to Enjoy Kinder!

  Any fan of Kinder chocolate will adore this fun new bar! A creamy, milky filling loaded with popped and toasted cereal pieces (rice, buckwheat, barley, hulled wheat, and wheat), enrobed in a smooth milk chocolate coating. A sure way to put a smile on anyone's face, no matter how young or old!


(1 bar) 24 g
Imported Fresh From The UK!

entry.title: Galaxy Minstrels Big Bag - 66g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

 Pleasure Worth Sharing.

  It's the same Galaxy Minstrels you know and love, just in a bigger bag! Share the rich, creamy goodness of Galaxy Milk Chocolate coated in a crispy, hard candy shell with all of your friends - or just have them all yourself (don't worry, we won't judge). M&M's truly have nothing on these premium chocolates! 

Why have cotton when you can have silk?

 

(1 share size pouch) 66g

entry.title: Revels - 35g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

A Bit of Mystery in Every Bite! 

   Traditional chocolate has been boring you lately, huh? We get it, you need some spice and excitement in your life. Well, your flavour adventure begins right here with the treat only able to be found in the UK - Revels!

  Each creamy Revel contains a surprise underneath the chocolate exterior. Which flavour will you get next? You can never be sure! Will it be raisin? Orange? Coffee? Maybe just plain chocolate. Or it could be Malteser or even toffee! These chocolate bites will keep you guessing what you're going to taste. 

 So tell us, can you guess right?

 

(1 pouch) 35g

entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Orange Giant Buttons UK - 95g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

The Delectable Dairy Milk Chocolate Taste You Love, With a Citrusy Twist!

  Straight from the UK, Cadbury has brought you a new sweet that you're sure to love. These Giant Buttons have the same creamy and smooth Dairy Milk chocolate taste infused with real Orange oil to give you a boost of fruity flavour, elevating the enjoyment of your confection. 

  Whether you're a fan of Dairy Milk or orange flavoured chocolate, we know you won't be able to get enough of these tangy treats!

 

 

(1 bag) 95g

entry.title: Yorkie Orange Bar - 46g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

Don't Miss Out On This Limited Edition Flavour!

  This classic British chocolate bar features a citrusy twist! If you're a fan of chunky pieces of smooth milk chocolate with a delicious orange flavour, this is definitely the bar for you. Don't miss out because this bar won't be here for long, so you might as well try it while it's here! 

  Aren't a fan of orange chocolate yourself? Get it as a gift for anyone you know who does, or check out our other flavours of Yorkie if we've got you curious about this awesome Nestle chocolate bar!

entry.title: Cadbury Twirl Orange UK - 43g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

Give this Twirl a Whirl!

Retro Candy -1970's

Looking for an intense chocolate hit? Try the Limited Edition Cadbury Twirl Orange chocolate bar that offers twice the pleasure, with two delicious milk chocolate fingers infused with an orange hit. These two flake-style bars were originally introduced in the 1970s as a solo bar, but repackaged in 1984 as a twin, since 2 are better than 1! Let it melt in your mouth as the twirling ribbons unfold. Perfect for indulging. 

43g
